issues.title: CUR Ingestion Pipeline: S3 → Glue → Athena
issues.body:
Implement the AWS Cost & Usage Report ingestion pipeline.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- CUR delivered to S3 daily and bucket path documented.
- Glue crawler created and scheduled; schema updates reflected in Athena.
- Athena base tables accessible to ETL jobs.
- Validation query shows parity with AWS Cost Explorer within 5%.

**Notes:** Configure KMS encryption, bucket lifecycle, and access roles.

issues.title: Usage Ingestion Job: Orchestrator → Raw Usage Table
issues.body:
Create hourly ingestion job for bench usage data from the orchestrator.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Hourly job ingests orchestrator JSON payloads to `raw_usage` table.
- Schema aligns with Sprint 2 orchestrator payload contract.
- Ingestion failures generate alerts and retry logs.

**Notes:** Use Lambda or scheduled Glue job with idempotency.

issues.title: Normalized Cost ETL: join cost + usage + metadata
issues.body:
Build ETL transformations to produce normalized cost metrics.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- `cost_per_bench`, `cost_per_execution`, `idle_hours` computed and persisted to curated Athena tables.
- ETL failures trigger alerts and produce clear error messages.
- ETL output schema documented and stable for downstream consumers.

**Notes:** Implement incremental processing and partitioning for cost efficiency.

issues.title: Tagging Compliance Validator (Runtime Scanner)
issues.body:
Implement a runtime Lambda that scans infra for required tags and reports/rectifies issues.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Lambda identifies missing/invalid `CostCenter`, `Owner`, `Environment`, `Service`, `Project`, `BenchID` tags.
- Notifications sent to owners via Slack/SNS with actionable details.
- Findings written to DynamoDB for audit and historical tracking.

**Notes:** Respect IAM least-privilege and avoid modifying tags without owner consent (configurable).

issues.title: CI Policy: Tag Enforcement in Terraform + GitHub Actions
issues.body:
Add a GitHub Actions job that validates Terraform resource tags and blocks PRs without required tags/values.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- CI job runs on PRs and checks Terraform configs for required tags.
- PR fails with clear message when tags missing or values invalid.
- Allowed tag values sourced from a central policy file (stored in repo).

**Notes:** Provide remediation guidance in CI output.

issues.title: Idle-Stop Automation Lambda (Detection → Warn → Stop)
issues.body:
Create scheduled automation to identify idle benches, notify owners, and stop unused instances after grace period.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Idle benches detected from curated metrics and flagged.
- Owner receives warning; if no action, instance is stopped after configurable threshold.
- All actions recorded in an immutable audit log (DynamoDB) with timestamps and rationale.

**Notes:** Include feature flags to disable auto-stop in environments.

issues.title: Bench-State Validation Integration with Observability Signals
issues.body:
Integrate bench-state and activity signals from testbench-observability to avoid false stops.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Idle-stop reads bench-state signals (active, scheduled, maintenance) before action.
- Active or scheduled benches are excluded from stopping logic.
- Integration tested end-to-end in non-prod environments.

**Notes:** Use existing Sprint 4 metrics/labels and fail-safe checks.

issues.title: Forecasting Model: 30-Day Bench Usage Forecast (Simple Regression)
issues.body:
Implement a simple forecasting pipeline to predict bench usage for the next 30 days and store results.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Daily forecast produced and stored in `forecasting` table.
- Model error (MAE) under 15% when evaluated on recent 3-month history.
- Forecast outputs consumed by monthly report pipeline.

**Notes:** Start with regression; make model swappable per ADR.

issues.title: Spend Anomaly Detection & Alerts
issues.body:
Create anomaly detection rules and alerting for abnormal spend spikes.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Alerts trigger when spend deviates from baseline by configured thresholds.
- CloudWatch/CloudWatch Events or Athena-based scheduled queries generate alerts.
- Notifications sent to Slack/SNS with context and recommended actions.

**Notes:** Baseline can be rolling 30-day average; tune thresholds in staging.

issues.title: Cost Dashboards: Grafana/QuickSight Panels
issues.body:
Create dashboards for cost-per-team, utilization, idle waste, and trends.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Dashboards use Athena as data source and refresh key panels <3 minutes.
- Panels include cost-per-team, cost-per-bench, idle percentage, forecast view.
- Dashboard JSON/configs stored in repo for CI validation.

**Notes:** Provide role-based access for engineering and finance viewers.

issues.title: Dashboard JSON Validation CI Job
issues.body:
Add CI checks to validate dashboard JSON/definitions before merges.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- CI job validates JSON/YAML formats and required fields.
- Invalid dashboards fail the PR with useful error messages.
- Successful validation publishes artifacts to build workspace.

issues.title: ETL Unit Tests and CI Integration (Pandas/Python)
issues.body:
Write unit tests for ETL metric computations and integrate into CI.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Test coverage >=70% for transformation functions.
- Mocked CUR and usage fixtures validate metric outputs.
- Tests run on GitHub Actions for PRs; failures block merges.

issues.title: Glue & Athena Terraform Module
issues.body:
Provision Glue crawler, Athena DB, and base tables with Terraform modules.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Terraform module provisions Glue crawler, Glue DB, Athena workgroup, and S3 paths.
- Module parameterized for dev/stage/prod and outputs resource identifiers.
- Module documented and tested in a sandbox environment.

issues.title: IAM Least-Privilege Roles for ETL & Automation
issues.body:
Define and apply least-privilege IAM roles for ingestion, processing, and automation components.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Separate roles for ingestion, ETL processing, and automation with scoped permissions.
- No wildcard `*` permissions; reviewed by IAM Access Analyzer.
- Roles deployed via Terraform and referenced by Lambdas/Glue jobs.

issues.title: Monthly Cost Reporting Pipeline (EventBridge → Step Function)
issues.body:
Implement scheduled monthly reporting pipeline that compiles summary, forecast, and rightsizing suggestions and sends to Slack/Teams.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Monthly job runs via EventBridge and Step Functions.
- Report includes summary, forecast, and top rightsizing recommendations.
- Report archived to S3 and a notification posted to Slack/Teams.

issues.title: Runbook Documentation: ETL, Idle-Stop, Dashboards
issues.body:
Create operational runbook with troubleshooting steps and on-call procedures.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- `docs/RUNBOOK.md` includes steps for ETL failures, idle-stop rollback, dashboard issues, and alert handling.
- Runbook stored in repo and linked in deployment docs.
- On-call rotation and escalation documented.

issues.title: ADR Updates: ETL, Idle-Stop Strategy, Dashboard Stack
issues.body:
Update ADRs to reflect implementation choices and decisions made in Sprint 5.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- ADR-001, ADR-002, ADR-005 updated and added to `/docs/adrs`.
- ADRs include rationale, tradeoffs, and migration plan.
- ADRs reviewed and approved in PR.

issues.title: Performance & Cost Validation Tests (Athena query cost, idle-stop sandbox)
issues.body:
Benchmark Athena query costs and validate idle-stop workflow on sandbox benches.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Representative queries cost measured and documented; any expensive queries optimized.
- Idle-stop tested on sandbox benches without impacting production.
- Test results stored in repo and improvements actioned.

issues.title: ETL Monitoring & Alerting: Ingestion Lag and Processing Errors
issues.body:
Add CloudWatch metrics and alerts for ingestion lag, ETL failure rates, and data freshness.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- CloudWatch metrics exposed: ingestion_lag_hours, etl_failure_count, data_freshness_minutes.
- Alerts created for SLA breaches and routed to on-call channel.
- Dashboards include these operational panels.

issues.title: Tag Compliance Reporting & Owner Remediation Workflow
issues.body:
Create reporting for tag compliance and remediation workflow for owners.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Daily compliance report summarizing missing/invalid tags per owner/team.
- Owners receive remediation instructions and have a window to fix before escalation.
- Compliance metrics exposed on dashboard.
